name: John von Neumann
work_institutions: University of Berlin, Princeton University, Institute for Advanced Study, Site Y, Los Alamos
alma_mater: University of Pázmány Péter, ETH Zurich
doctoral_students: Donald B. Gillies, Israel Halperin, John P. Mayberry
known_for: Game theory, von Neumann algebras, von Neumann architecture, Cellular automata
religion: Converted Roman Catholic; previously agnostic; born to a non-practicing Jewish family
